Title: Beaches
Actors: Bette Midler, Barbara Hershey, John Heard, Spalding Gray
Plot: When the New York child performer CC Bloom and San Francisco rich kid Hillary meet in a holiday resort in Atlantic City, it marks the start of a lifetime friendship between them. The two keep in touch through letters for a number of years until Hillary, now a successful lawyer moves to New York to stay with struggling singer CC. The movie shows the various stages of their friendship and their romances including their love for the same man.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 1 win & 5 nominations.
